subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.4 in Eclipse
msgSnippet: FYI, I also understand that JUnit 4.4 (or later) will be included in the December milestone of Eclipse 3.4. David Saff
messageBody:
FYI, I also understand that JUnit 4.4 (or later) will be included in
the December milestone of Eclipse 3.4.

David Saff

On Nov 6, 2007 12:18 AM, Lasse Koskela <lasse.koskela@...> wrote:
> On Nov 6, 2007 1:01 AM, choweining <choweining@...> wrote:
> > How do I enable the usage of JUnit 4.4 in Eclipse?
>
> By adding the JUnit 4.4 jar file to your project's class path.
>
> Lasse
>
> --
> Lasse Koskela
